Blog.post: ok fine..actually not gonna write an entry today de..its all becuz of someone..say i scold vulgar lang here..its like wth lo..my blog k..i can scold or write wadeva i wan lo..not as if i cant scold out..me juz merely typed out the first letter of the word thn the someone buay song..u don like thn don read k?donid apologise or wad..its my prob k?my fault k..u don say wateva ur fault liao.. today go kallang again..got SYF..sian..thn today we changed bus n sits..lol..whoohoo..finally not thtborin le..beside is fiona thn gina..thn bhind is zhiqiang[newfren+ah gong] thn fuhao[bro] thn jinyuan[mommy]lol..so fun lo..thn i made frenz with those sec one fajarbeside me..thn thy ask me play gb anot..thn i told thm mine lo..thn thy asked my name..thn i dowan tell thm ma..thn i say ppl call me blackie thy can call tht oso..thn thy call me tht lo..thn me bored over lo..thn i disturb my mommy ahgong n bro..i pull their pants de below..thn i untie their shoe laces..cuz thy behind me..thn juz nice..lol..lucky thy nvr bu shuang me..thn we got mac burger for lunch?thn fajar de boi thy all ask me got burger give thm anot..thou i have none with me tht time..cuz thy only got beehoon..lol..plus me become their fren liao..so funny..thn later came back lo..bah.. i n sy alrite le lo..ok fine..maybe i shld change my prev entry so tht the someone wont kp me..wateva..i shldn use kp..if not the someone will come say me liao.. wateva la..maybe u haven seen me vulga b4..thts y u have so much comments abt my entries..now tht u noe im a freakin vulgar gal..thn stay away frm me lo..i dowanna u to 'quarrel' abt how vulgar i am.. im vulgar go hide

ok..its yun's bdae..plan like siao..esp with her HIM..thn walao ed..thot she wld be grateful..thn ended up..................walao..F u man..i down help liao..knn..help liao thn dio u..f man..dotx.. boooo..nth to say man..donid elaborate today liao..can see in their blogs.. so wateva la..i n |L nth le lo..frenz again..maybe its a good thing?i dono la..maybe its betta rite now for us..thn tml got SYF..dot..sian..late go home again liao.. no feelin type liao..fffffffffffffffffffffff man.. thanks for all that i nth to say

yest..nice fun day..mornin go out..go with jh..to shop..pei him..lol..k la..can oso say he pei me..thn later dono y say he skinny..thn he say he got 6 pack?lol..thn i say really meh..thn he say i can touch..thn i really go touch..lol..hey..REALLY GOT LO!!!haha..thn later go eat..thn have to go to lakeside le..cuz got performance at DBS..thn meetin there with all harmonica mates..thn bring thm..me incharge ma..suay..so many xiao3 guas..haha..thn reach tanjong pagar..have to wait instructor's de fren bring us..cuz i dono how to go..lol..hehe..thn she abit late..budden nvrm la..thn come le we all go off lo..thn my good jr..indian de..he go hold my cute jr[weikiat]de hand..thn i wen over disturb..i go hold weikiat de hand oso..lol..thn thy all say me cheng4 ji..haha..heck thm..thn my jr was like pullin wk away frm me..thn say don hold strangers de hand..thn i go ask wk he fortunate anot..thn he say ya..thn he say he felt lucky..lol..lucky leh..budden he nvr say y he lucky la..suay..haha..scally is he don dare say he lucky hold hand with me..lol..wateva..thn reach le..get the shirts out..distribute to those whom haven gotten thm..hey our shirt chio leh..cuz i designed de..lol..its BLACK with white imprint..cool hor?lol..kk..thn got rehearsal..we were not v nervous whn with whole grp de item..whn playin VICTORY in smaller grp de time damn nervous..cuz v harda play..thn we scared ma..thn play finish le i was breathless n trembling like siao..it was rehearsal only lo..thn later was dinner time..took dinner at 5plus 6?damn early..the food was alrite..at least i ate la..haha..thn wen to practice..thn later came back sittin place..haha..guess wad i did..i took my fren de phone thn took photo of me with wk..haha..he sooooo cute lo!!really v cute..haha..thn later we wen dowan pract at the lounge..thn v funny..at first only 4 of us..slowly more came..thn my siao jr there wanna bite another guy jr[the mix blood one]..thy siao de..haha..thn dono la..tht gal jr go n say some stuff..which made me n the mix blood jr sorta paiseh..cuz she went to ask him who most prettiest in our harmonica grp..thn he told her is me..wth?he got bad taste!thn evryone there desiao both of us..dot..thn later wen up..thn watch concert start..thn out turn was after interval..so abit more time to slack..thn we were early downstairs..we at bck stage playin lo..thn got this fat jr..she damn freakin scarily strong!!!she push me i can move..i push her she don move..not evn a single millicentimetre step!!tough man..haha..thn wk so cute..he look at me..thn he say..huihui jie jie wo hen pa..haha..he cute seh..thn i wen over call him don scared..thn later dono y tokin to my indian jr abt his 6 packS?lol..thn he lemme touch..of cuz can thn i go touch wad rite?lol..thn i was sayin i today touched 2ppl's 6 packs..so shuang..haha..thn our performance time..go up stage..not nervous lo..dono y..is the nxt VICTORY one..thn we scared..lucky nth really went wrong..thn asked the rest how we did..thy said v good..betta thn rehearsal time..thn ok lo..let thm bluff us lo..thn over le..is rdy for encore piece..played le..thn go le..thn nth much liao..cept tht wen packin up stuff thn goin down tht time tok to my mix blood jr..thn the rest were like lookin at us..give weird eyes..lol..ya thn went off..thn go lau pa sat eat..thn go home le.. wah..long entry..great day.. sorry doesn't really helps everytime

walao..siao one..call us go tht stupid thinggy..juz to pian4 us with 2 CCA pts..ok a..thts quite alot..but donid call us do such stupid stuff rite?shake pompoms..disgustin..smel liao wanna vomit seh..thn the shinny sheet..makes deafenin noises..i dowanna go deaf lo..puuuhlease..thn the frame thinggy..change colour card til pek chek man..will ki siao de lo..thn wad..dio a stupid bus num..got to stay extra with the class in the bus with EU..wah piang eh..chao extra lo..somore waD?MRS FONG!!!damn F lo..lol..thn wen thy call us std thn go with tchers those guys behind there were lookin at me..say me suay..smth lidat..lol..sian..thn tml oso have..hope change bus man..i cant carry on in there..sian diao lo.. today..woke up at 9..cuz got harmonica pract at 1030?but i reached at 11..cuz i go out at ard 1030?cuz of my com..wahaha..so happy..no more pop ups desiao me play gB le..whoohoo..haha..thx to mummy[jinyuan]..thn go le found out only 3 ppl there..wth lo..thot alot..hai wo pia like siao..okok..thn later 12 went to lakeside psch..whoohoo..many jrs..found out i lao3 le..haix..haha..thn played sme songs with thm..thn went to lunch with 3 of em n instructor..thn v cok up la..abit pissed lo..cuz the commitee alot ps wad..so many nvr come..ended up the 2 who say nvr come came..piang..but heng la..thn gave out shirts..gosh man..3 big de only..thn we there got 6 big size de..piang..thn 3 muz sqeeze in smaller de..cuz bobian..cant buy le ma..thn dotx la..thn eneded at 3 lidat..thn pia out..ya..thn went see fish with |L..lol..funny us..thn went home la..ya..sian..tml oso got the CRAP..somore v long lo..pengz..dono will die there anot man..haha.. oh ya performance only 3 more days..v nervous..scared leh..somore we still not perfect yet lo..haix..muz pract like siao le..somore hw still haven touch..haha..nvrm..heck le..don care..my performance n erm..[dowanna tell] more impt..haha.. oh ya yest got BBQ at summerdale..is my ex class 1/4 de BBQ..v fun..tho beginni go v sian..thn we tou tou play water..cuz cant go in pool with shirt n shorts ma..thn play abit only..thn security guard came..lucky din cot us..if not get chased out like one of my frenz..suay him..thn abit sian sian la..cuz so long nv see thm thn not so close le wad..budden lucky got some those seldom tok to thm even last time came over tok to me..so not tht bad..the guys all tall le..some more shuai le..haha..the gals nvr change lo..haha..thn evenin start BBQ..i de one there say this cooked le or tht still raw all those..lol..cuz thy don really noe how to see..wahaha i pro hor?lol..tn ok this guy came..juz saw him last sat..sorta keep seein him at JP de lo..thn he damn weird..he yest wanna hug me..-_- yea..hug dao..but i siam..dot la he..thn keep askin me wad i wanna eat thn ask me..thn somore pluck praan shell thn ask me wanna eat prawn anot..dot..thn he wanna feed me..of cuz i din eat wad he gave me la..i siam all the way..lol..[wei huai ren..u see le don jealous hor=P]ya ok..thn he almost sent me to the MRT stat lo..but lucky din..if not he wil get to see |L..n get beaten up?lol..who noes?haha..k le..betta not say so much..later someone will angry..=P tc all..wish me gd luck 4 my performance!! never look down on others

yea..today..abit oversleep la..cuz last nite slept at 4am?ok la not really..slept at 11 lidat..thn woke up SUDDENLY at 1am..thn replied |L's sms..thn who noes he replied..thn ya..smsed till 4am thn wen back to sleep..cuz today got freakin band!!BAND SUX!!bah..haha..k was abit late for band..reach skool le saw many npcc de..frm clmti town de..dono got wad activity la..who cares..thn chris was on 3rd lvl..he siao one..i downstairs he stil wave to me..haha..sicko..thn i wave back la..bobian..if not he sure say i act dao..k thn reach band room..set up my saxo..thn wen out for sectional..wah piang sibei sian outside..thn slack damn lot..thn hor today i play long notes play till giddy..dono y..maybe too long nvr play le..heck..thn later went in room..listen conductor awhile..thn break..nth much la..thn today band time so boliao my section..it was pearl's fault..she started sayin this bloody tht bloody..thn end up me n my jr lame with it lo..thn i told chris:keep ur bloody saxo la..thn he v bad..he told me:shut the bloody hell up..lol..no la..he don mean it..we were all jk..cuz he got hear us play ma..hhaha..thn later wen je..thn jr fllow along..thn go meet |L..ya..dowan elaborate le..btw to all those whom were askin abt us..thx for ur concerns..we ok le..thx alot..nice frenz i've got man.. so tml..got SYF flashcard crap..actually wanna pon de..budden din la..cuz fren call me don pon..thn go for BBQ later..thn ok lo..shui bian la..so will go BBQ later..can go can le..heck wad time go..i bet it wld be fun tml!!!haha..*awaits* tc all always look at the bright side of life

yest nite we smsed..thn later he replied he dono wad to say..thn i replied -thn don say bye..gosh..guess it was too harsh..he really din reply..i din mean it lo..haix..thn later at nite i got sms him..thn oso got use my sis the phone sms him..but fake tht im my sis..thn ask he alrite anot n all..thn he said stuff which i don like to hear lo..smth like after few days i will go to a guy whose betta thn him n all..i really angry le..thn i din reply..i went to sleep..thn mornin woke up decided to sms him again..ok..actually din wan to..but i still did..dono y..at onepm i sent the msg..i guess he wld be awake by 2pm..but he din reply me till now!!thn juz now online he oso..i went over n said yo..but he din reply..thn my sis oso usin her msn..she yo to him..HE REPLIED!!wth!!ok..i get it..u really sian diao..me too..haix..suan le..thn i juz smsed him thru my sis phone fakin im my sis again to ask y he din reply me..but..he haven reply my sis..so 4get it la..haix..ya thn yest sms tht time i told him tht we oso din break..[okok u shld noe wad happened to us few days ago]..it was juz some disputes lo..so guess we din break..thn he ask whether i still his stead thn i said i dono..ya..i really dono..so..haix haix haix..thn later i told him i told ppl who noe abt we stead tht we break le=X[said the wrong thing i guess..shldnt have said tht]haix..k my fault..thn he replied n say i din care abt his feelins[smth lidat]n tht i hurt him..ok i noe i did..i was wrong..well all along after friday i shldnt have smsed him..SHLDNT have..cuz i told myself n my sis tht im not gonna sms him till i "shuang"..ok la..not actually tht word i shld use..is till i have a clear mind..but i din stick to it..i still smsed him..haix..shld have stick to it n not give myself so much troubles..but i din..think i xing too luan3...yea..thn since he today nvr replied me or wateva..means he made the first move..n im tastin my own medicine..ok..fine..i get it..i leave him..i will..haix..bye.. |L=guess u wld see all this..i used my sis's hp tht day to "tell" u my this blog...so ya..u shld noe wad i wanna tell..sori for evryth..i will leave u n save u frm al troubles.. ok..so if he din see all this..thn i dono le la.. ok..my BIG day is on sat..v excited..dono who wanna come see my concert..which is 5bucks per ticket..anyone wanna support me[n shout ENCORE at the end of the concert]call me or sms me to book tickets frm me..its in the evenin..DBS auditorium.. byez all n tc.. never do something you would regret

this few days lotsa stuff happen..yest bad stuff la..good stuff is tht my terms with sis..real de sis la..ya..not bad..quite good la..nvr quarrel..thx to |L lo..dono y oso..my sis noe him e n all thn we[=me n sis] v good..thn found out she actually got feelins?lol..thn helped me quite alot lo..thn ya..yest smth happened la..only some ppl noe..shan't elaborate..thn my sis durin nite time ask me give |him a chance..i dono la..maybe i shld?maybe i shldn't?i dono???v luan4..bah..see la..aiya dono la.. whooo..holiday over soon?nxt wk busy wk..my BIG DAY is on nxt sat..thn got BBQ on tues..which clashes on the SYF thinggy?ya..heck..think im gonna pon it n say tht i 4got abt it...heck la..my 1/4 in JSS rox..so i muz go..lol.. today got harmonica lesson..fun day today..lol..ya..tht day after lesson we whole grp go play bball..thou thy don really noe abt the game..it was fun la..lol..oh ya yest went to watch ARD THE WORLD IN 80 DAYS..not bad..quite nice..shldnt be watchin it de lo..but i did..with my sis..treated her pop corns..lol..those GIGANtIC tub..lol..cant belive we actually finished it damn fast..k la..guess was my mood?ate quite fast..my sis faster la..dono y..bah..oh ya yest de tennis..my dad praised my strokes improvin alot..i guess its my mood ba..usually not v good mood thn will hit harda thn somtimes betta..bah..dono..my theorem..stop here..STILL HAVEN DONE MY HOMEWORK.. homeworks are not meant to be done

sorry for wad i said yesterday..sorry..its all my fault..don think tht its ur fault..its mine not urs..sori..u really tooo good for me le..i muz not hold u on..u shld give other gals whose waitin for u chance..sori..u are really good to me..sori..guess it's all fate..fate wans me to leave..i dono..maybe we shall let time heal..maybe it's betta..maybe this is to test us n make us cherish our moments together..i dono..ijuz noe tht im sori.. there's always hope

flu..so sick lo..keep sneezn..thn today went m'sia wit my family n couz..thn whn i was at the shoppin mall i keep sneezin like siao..thn was like wth..so sian..thn cannot evn walk walk in peace..sian..go there see nvr buy stuff..bought a ring nia..thn saw the gals wear uniform..wah piang eh..tuck in like siao lo..wah piang eh man..cant stand it lo..yuck man..thy not like us in sg..all tuck out after sch..bah..hmm..yea thn go home le..i was like so excited to go home lo..hehecuz go sms someone ma..lol..yea..shld be able to guess la..yea..oh ya went out with him only..to je library?yea..thn walk ard lo..thn walk till sci centre?lol..ya funny us..thn play with the fountain n i was half wet?ok la din play..juz walked across it?yea..thn went ard thn walk till imm..thn at 2nd lvl walk walk..thn he said got his shop there..ya GOT..lol..shop with his name la..lol..so qiao lo..thn walk walk thn there not much ppl de ma..thn arms brush each other..thn he erm got hold of my finnnnger..yea..thn erm he hoold my hannd lo..ya hoold hannd..for quite long?thn my mum called me to go home..ya..called..my phone la..thn we walk back till stat..hoold hannd back lo..ya..there's smth i shld tell those who noes abt my blog..eh ya..budden erm..dono leh..dono wanna sya anot..din wanna tell anybody de..well maybe if u all ask thn i tell u all lo..but not gonna write here?ya..dono la..think donid ask u all can guess ba?ya..thts all lo.. goshHOMEWORK..still haven touch dao..die for sure..heck.. chances are to be made

wah sian sia..this few days freakin sian..dono y..cuz of midnite chats?bah..dono la..yest nite |L go his dad fact work..thn cant chat..budden ended up got chat..is v late la..2am plus till 3am plus..yestnite v weird..i sleep le stil can get woken up by the vibration of phone de..normally sleep like pig..haha..yea..thn chat lo..thn this mornin woke at 9...damn tired..watched tv thn later go back sleep at 10 till 1..wah..sian..thn later went to bkshop buy asses for my sis..yea..thn go home..wah sian..dowan type on..update tml la..real sian.. you can wait for the rain to stop but not stop the rain

yea..yest went movies..with |L his sis n 6 his cous..alot hor?thn is meet at je train..we went in to meet..thy at one end ma..thn i walk to tht end to find thm..thn sat beside his sis..thn tok abit..dono wad to tok abt ma..thn tok abt my swimmin de jr..haha she noes him..thn |L n his other couz bully their small couz his name is EN EN..he v cute..haha..thn thy v voilent..tickle here n there..hit here n there..ya heck..thn i told |L de sis tht v sia suay..thn she abit paiseh reply..thn inth to say la..thn later rreach causeway pt..thn |L go his aunt hse with his couz..thn i with his sis n small couz go arcade..budden i seldom play de ma..thn go see see lo..thn reached tthere EN EN ran away..he disappeared..k la..no la..he playin with my n his sis..thn we walk here n there find him..thn found out he took the escalators up..thn we follow..thn he take come down!!WTH..bobian lo..thn follow..thnwent down liao he go up..thn we heck le..we went off walk walk..ya thn go cd shop..thn latr his sis received his call..thn thy ask us to go book tickets..thn i was like huh?tickets can book lidat de meh?i thot call de thn can?thn we go up see see la..thn on the way saw a yandao..really shuai leh..lol..kk..ya he saw us went up hn he keep lookin here..siao one..haha..thn heck we all went up 2gether with EN EN cuz he come find us..thn go ask..sia suay la..canot..thn thinkin wana book with card..thn cannot..lan4 place la..thn bobian she call back tell |L cannot..tn thy come down le lo..thn EN EN was like sayin i alota money..thn |L's sis say give him a 10cent can liao..lol..thn i gave leh..its was damn shinny lo..haha..thn later thy come le..thn take money thn thy buy..ya..thn buy water to drink..wanted to pay n buy MYSELF..he keep askin m wad i wan..thn i say liao he ask the person thn he paid lo..dot..ya bobian..thn ws still early ma..we all hang ard at the cafe table..thn got alota Home On The Rang de stickers..EN EN took all..lol..thn he got his ears twisted by his sis..omg..real violent lo..i was like..stop it la..v pain..cuz his ear went red..lol..thn went in lo..thn his couz disapper?i mean the oldest there n gal de..thn we wait there..thn thy play with the stickers lo..stick here n there..thn got the poster on the wall hn thy go stick on the nose of the actors.siao one..thn later she came back we went in..k i think |he n his is say where to sit hao3 hao3 le..thy all went in the |L thn his sis infront of me..i thot i will be sittin there..at the end but din..was inbtwn the 2..k lo..bobian..she call me go in ma..thn aiya suan4 le..thn watch la..the show v funny lo..budden cold..dn really enjoy alot..freakin cold man..the aircon dono new one or wd..i was shiverin inside ok..thn he saw me like v cold thn he ask me lo..thn i say ya thn ask wan his jacket anot..thn i say donid..thn thru out he like ask alotta times i v cold izit..thn he hor..v funny..i beside him only leh..he oso sms me..dot..he say i v cold thn put my hand in his hands thn i wont so cold..i was like huh?dot dot dot..bah..thn i din la..siao..if i did thn im v zu3 dong4..haha..thn he like wanna hold me hand..budden evrytime he try his sis was tokin to me..lol..er..haha..yea..heck..ya so ended up nth happened in the movie..yea..thn go popular..needa buy assesm bks for my sis..wah sian..thn he followed me thn the rest disappeared frm inside to outside?i dono..thn found his guy couz..thn he ask y he smsin at tht corner..lol..thn his couz say as long as his away frm him..thn was like ok i noe wad u all doin..ya thn i hafta go..its 5 plus got tennis ma..yea..thn muz go off..thn told him thn he walk me to train..thn was walkin quite close la..cuz our arms keep brushin against each other..ya..don think so much..nth happened la..thn go off le lo..thn he sms me thn ask me y i was unhappy..i wasnt lo..dono y he asked leh..heck..thn go home go tennis lo..ya..nth la..thn v late go home..ard 10 lidat thn reach home cuz after tennis go eat ma..thn i reach my room open my cupboard thn heard DRRR DRRR..ok..its was my phone vibratin..damn loud..|L called..ya..his timin damn zun..i juz opened my cupboard lo..cuz was like we always tok on phone at nite..thn i eyst nvr reply his msg at 8 de..thn maybe he thot wad thn he called earlier tht day..i told him i juz home thn later thn tok..ya thn at nite..got tok on phone lo..we evryday do tht since monday nite?yea..n my bill..gosh die le la..hehe..nvrm la.. thn this mornin woke up at 758?lol..thn found my phone without any sms..abit disappointed..cuz he frm monday till now after we tok on phone thn i go sleep he will sms me smth de..budden thot today don have..thn i go chk my other num..ok he smsd to tht num..thot wad..thn was quite happy lo..hehe..yea..thn came online..ya..later gonna tok on phone again..we tok on phone at mornin to afternoon thn at nite..alot leh..haha..yea..bah.. yay!today sat..got harmonica lesson tonite..rox man..haha..oh ya..H-O-M-E-W-O-R-K..k haven start?lol..good luck to me..doubt will touch alot on it..hehe..ehck..hmwk sux.. cherish everyone around you

hmm..long time no write this kinda stuff liao..think gonna type a long one abt wad happened this few days?hmm.start with |L 1st la..this few days we tok alot?on phone at nite..tou tou de la..of cuz..think bill gonna burst again?heehe..nvm la..ya..|he like still waitin for me..i really think |he is a good guy lo..i think i may give |him a chance leh..dono y oso..weird feelin..cuz like got other guys ask me be their gf..thn i like reject thm..thn cuz of smth stopin me..think its |him?dono la..think still got feelins lo..see la..i oso dono..haix..ya la..hmm think goin watch movie on sat with |him his sis his couz n my sis?dono see how first..well thou |he abit fat la..i don mind leh..don la..love is blind?lol..bah..dono.. tis mornin..woke up at 10?late ar..cuz yest chat on phone ma..wahaha..ya..thn saw |his msg..|he ask i can be |his dear anot..thou nvr stead but wanna be my dear n smth lidat...thn i shui2bian4 lo..i say anyth..wont wu4hui4 ba..ya thn later eat breakfast..the mifen so much..till now still full man..heck..thn later tokon phone with |him again..hehe..thn watchin the channel 8 show..so funny..thn the gal inside v erxing..thn |he oso watchin ma..together with his smal couz[guy]..v cute leh his couz..p5..thn do erxing stuff..like to kiss |his hands..my couz oso..always kiss me..wth..YUCK..thn watch la..thn we laughin ..thn later got gao3xiao4xin2dong4..we oso keep laughin..v funny ma..thn later play com..still on the phone..hehe..till |he go out make ic..actually |he ask me pei2 him go de..budden i cant go out..my mum half day leave..end up don have..wah sian diao..thn din go lo..bah..thn now here dono do wad..play gb liao..but sian la.. hmm yst go band..i PON..whoohoo..so song..i 1st time pon band twice in a row leh..mon oso pon..mon is mass pon..we all pon together whole gang..thn thy all not happy..heck..don give a damn BAND SUX..thn yest junior caled me up ask y i nvr go band..thn i told her i juz reached home..i wen
